search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Nimble (nimble.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Nimble is: [https://www.nimble.com/pricing/](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Nimble CRM Pricing. Start free. CRM Cost Per Month for Small Businesses
===============
                             

[![Image 10: Nimble](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)](https://www.nimble.com/)

*   Features

*   [Partner](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/partner/)
*   Resources
    *   [Demos & Webinars](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/company/webinars/)
    *   [Support](https://support.nimble.com/?_ga=2.142612661.1034510720.1530114628-1245960411.1530114628)
    *   [Apps Marketplace](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/marketplace/)
    *   [Customer Stories](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/customers/)
    *   [In the Media](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/press/)
*   [Blog](https://www.nimble.com/blog)
*   [Login](https://app.nimble.com/)
*   [Try For Free](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/register/business_trial/?lead_source=website)

*   [All Features * Summary of all key Nimble features.](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/crm-features/)
*   [Email Marketing NEW * Create impactful email marketing campaigns.](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/email-marketing-crm-for-small-business/)
*   [Sales, Pipelines, & Reporting * Manage leads, track deals, & boost engagement with email sequences.](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/sales-automation/)
*   [Relationship Management * Identify, build, & nurture relationships to help you grow.](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/relationship-management/)
*   [Email Sequences * Tailor emails based on recipient actions, from your own email address.](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/crm-with-automated-email-sequences)
*   [Prospect Marketing & Outreach * Scale your outreach with email blasts or automated series.](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/crm-marketing-automation/)
*   [Inbox, Mobile, Social CRM * Works in your inbox, mobile, social, Microsoft & Google.](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/email-marketing-crm/)
*   [Web Forms * Capture important info & follow up on your valuable website leads.](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/web-forms/)
*   [Workflows & Automations * Automate repeatable processes across business teams.](https://www.nimble.com/pricing/workflow-automation-software/)

![Image 12](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

Clear & Simple CRM Pricing
==========================

monthly

.90

*   25,000 Contact Records
*   2 GB/Seat Storage
*   Microsoft 365 & Google Workspace Integration
*   Nimble Prospector
*   14-Day Trial

Enter your email

Try Nimble Free

Immediate access. No credit card needed.

By signing up, I agree to Nimble's  [Terms of Service](https://www.nimble.com/company/terms-of-service/)  and  [Privacy Policy](https://www.nimble.com/company/privacy/)

  

Try For Free Immediate access. No credit card required.

Learn More About Our Features

See All Features

Enhance Your Account with Upgrades
----------------------------------

#### EMAIL MARKETING

![Image 14: new](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

Supercharge Your Outreach with Nimble Email Marketing
-----------------------------------------------------

Create, send, and track **email campaigns** seamlessly within Nimble. Our built-in **email marketing add-on** helps you nurture leads, engage customers, and automate follow-ups effortlessly. Keep your audience engaged with stunning **newsletters**, **webinar invites**, and more—crafted easily using **pre-made templates** and an intuitive **drag-and-drop editor**. Turn connections into conversions with ease.

![Image 16: EMAIL MARKETING](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

#### DATA ENRICHMENT

Capture Emails,  
Phone Numbers & More
--------------------------------------

**Find missing information** in seconds while in Nimble, on any social site, website, or cloud application to **find important details** such as **email, phone, company name, job title, and location**. Credits can be added in increments of 100 for an additional $10 per month.

![Image 18: DATA ENRICHMENT](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

#### GROUP MESSAGING

Outreach at Scale
-----------------

**Send personalized group messages** with open and click tracking to any segment of your contacts. **1,000 messages per license per month** included with the Business Plan. Find detailed information about recurring and one-time upgrades [here](https://support.nimble.com/en/articles/9211121-nimble-s-group-message-billing-details).

![Image 20: GROUP MESSAGING](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

#### WEB FORMS

Generate Leads  
from Your Website
----------------------------------

Easily **generate leads** and **capture important information** from your website using a **powerful online form builder**. Test up to 10 web forms for free for 30 days and then for $12 per month per team.

![Image 22: WEB FORMS](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

#### CONTACTS & STORAGE

Scale Your Business with Nimble CRM
-----------------------------------

Get up to **25,000 contacts** at the account level. As you **grow your business**, you can add 10,000 contacts for an additional $10 per month. Each team member will also have 2GB of storage. You can upgrade to add storage in 10GB increments at $10 per month.

![Image 24: CONTACTS & STORAGE](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

We’ve Got Your Back
-------------------

Because you shouldn’t have to figure it out all on your own.

![Image 26: We’ve Got Your Back](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

![Image 28: Daily Live Q&A Sessions](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)Daily Live  
Q&A Sessions

1:1 Calls

![Image 32: Email Support](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)Email  
Support

![Image 34: Daily Live Q&A Sessions](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)Weekly Training  
Webinars

![Image 36: Daily Live Q&A Sessions](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)100 +  
Articles & Videos

The CRM You Will Actually Love Using.
-------------------------------------

Sign up for free today.

Enter your email

Try Nimble Free

Immediate access. No credit card needed.

By signing up, I agree to Nimble's  [Terms of Service](https://www.nimble.com/company/terms-of-service/)  and  [Privacy Policy](https://www.nimble.com/company/privacy/)

  

Try For Free Immediate access. No credit card required.

What Our Customers Are Saying
-----------------------------

Trusted by thousands of professionals like you around the world

Nimble has made a significant impact on our sales efforts. We we were able to identify and engage with potential leads more effectively and it’s resulted in increased conversions and revenue growth.

![Image 38: Kurt Daradics](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

Kurt Daradics
-------------

Co-Founder & General Partner

Realworld Asset Group

Nimble has generated a couple of thousands of dollars worth of work in the first two weeks of using it simply by reminding me and prompting me to engagement opportunities.

![Image 40: Marc Scott](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

Marc Scott
----------

Voice Actor

VO Business & Marketing Coach

Nimble is the tool that I have been using for years to automate my business. Nimble Prospector works where I work and allows me to tag and add contacts without having to do any data entry.

![Image 42: Amanda Robinson](blob:http://localhost/aef335eb562a1da6957ce25a574b4aa1)

Amanda Robinson
---------------

Founder

The Digital Gal

Nimble's Top Features
---------------------

1

### Relationship-focused CRM

Nimble is the perfect CRM for actors that value nurturing relationships, not just tracking dollars and deals.

2

### Unifies Contacts

Imagine a CRM that automagically builds itself from your siloed contacts & enriches contacts with social and business data.

3

### Works Everywhere

Create new or edit existing contact records directly from your inbox, LinkedIn and anywhere else you engage on the web

4

### Manages Business Processes

Nimble’s Workflows manage people-related processes that drive business growth.

See All Features

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

What counts as a contact in Nimble?

A contact is any named company or person record in your Nimble database.

How does the free trial work?

Your free trial lasts for 14 days and there is no credit card required. You may try Nimble with up to 5 licenses during your trial period.

How do I purchase Nimble?

After your free trial ends, you will be billed based on the number licenses on your account. Nimble is a recurring monthly subscription and you may cancel anytime. We also offer annual plans over 15% discount for your entire account. Additional upgrades or licenses will be billed on a pro-rated basis.

When am I billed for user licenses?

Nimble's pricing is based on the number of licenses you have on your account. You will be billed at the time you add a license to your Nimble account [Learn more.](https://support.nimble.com/billing-and-account/nimble-billing-policy?_ga=2.115094720.697137249.1690805867-433776368.1686528033&_gl=1*wwz6ee*_ga*NDMzNzc2MzY4LjE2ODY1MjgwMzM.*_ga_4S7MKRDHVP*MTY5MTA1MDg1OS40OC4xLjE2OTEwNTA5MDEuMTguMC4w)

When am I billed for storage and how is it calculated?

Each team member will have 2GB of storage. If you or a team member reaches this limit, you will be prompted to upgrade to add storage in 10GB increments at $10 per month. This bill is applied on a prorated basis for the remainder of the current billing cycle, and you will be billed the full amount at the start of the next billing cycle

What’s a Solution Partner?

Nimble works with Solution Partners to provide a full spectrum of small business solutions. You may have been referred to Nimble via a partner, and their name will appear on the billing page in your account.

Have another question?

Our Nimble Customer Care team is always happy to help you with any additional questions you might have. Send us a note at [\[email protected\]](https://www.nimble.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#5330322136133d3a3e313f367d303c3e) and we will be in touch!

The CRM You Will Actually Love Using.
-------------------------------------

Sign up for free today.

Enter your email

Try Nimble Free

Immediate access. No credit card needed.

By signing up, I agree to Nimble's  [Terms of Service](https://www.nimble.com/company/terms-of-service/)  and  [Privacy Policy](https://www.nimble.com/company/privacy/)

  

Try For Free Immediate access. No credit card required.

Relationship Management
-----------------------

Contact Management

### Manage business processes across departments in graphical boards or list views. Save time by using automations. Workflows & Automations new

new

### Segment your database into smaller batches for proper nurturing. Save searches for quick access. Segmentation & Saved Segments

### Unify multiple emails, calendars, and all your contacts into one easy to use solution. Microsoft & Google Integration

### Email, Calendar, Contact Sync

### Create notes and follow-up reminders that will send notifications directly to your Inbox and on your mobile device. Tasks can also be delegated to another team member. Tasks & Notes

### Set a time interval for when you would like to keep in touch with your important contacts. Select weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly, or custom reminders. Stay in Touch Reminder

### Log calls and create events from inside of Nimble, straight from your inbox and mobile, & anywhere else on the web via Nimble Prospector. Calls & Events

### Create custom fields to track unique information about your leads and customers. Use filed types such as: select box, short/long text, true/false flag, date field, number, etc. Custom Fields

### 1,000

### Apply tags to quickly group your contacts for easy organizationa and access. Tags

### Unlimited

### Attach files to contact records from OneDrive, Google Drive, Dropbox or from your computer. File Attachments

### Create permission groups and quickly set who on your team will have access to certain features. Contact Privacy Permissions

### Upgrades available: $10 per month for an additional 10,000 contacts. Contacts

### 25,000 Contact Records

### Storage includes all messages, activities, and deals. Upgrades available at a cost of $10 per month for an additional 10 GB of storage. Storage

### 2GB per user

Social Profile Matching & Enrichment

### Nimble builds live contact records in seconds enriching them with business and social details. Contact Auto-Enrichment

### Nimble saves you time by matching social profiles for your contacts and companies. Social Profile Matching

### Easily discover the email, phone number, social profile, locations, & additional URLs for your leads and customers. Business Insights Capture

### 25 Credits/user/month

Browser & Email Extensions

### Nimble Prospector is an extension for all the major browser that allows you to quickly create and edit contact records straight from your inbox and anywhere on the web. Hover over any name on the internet and save time on research and data entry. Nimble Prospector

### Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge

### Create new and edit existing records without ever leaving your inbox. Schedule meetings, create tasks for yourself and your team, find important contact info, and much more. Email Extensions

### Outlook, Gmail

Agenda & Activities

### Easily view a table of your own or your team's activities including Tasks, Events, and Calls that are upcoming, completed, and delegated. Individual & Team Activity Tracking

### Tasks, Events, Calls

### Assign tasks to other members of your team to ensure nothing falls through the cracks. Team Collaboration

Today Page

### Each team member can customize their Today Page with personal cover photo. Customizable Dashboard

### Each team member gets to completely customize their Today Page with widgets such as: Calendar, Events, Tasks, Email Tracking, Revenue Forecast, and many more. Custom Widgets

### 20+

Marketing & Outreach
--------------------

Web Forms & Lead Capture

### Easily generate leads and capture important information about your inbound leads. Test up to 10 web forms for free for 30 days and then for $12 month per team. Web Forms

Group Messages

Pipeline Management

### Empower your sales team with multiple customizable pipelines. Customize your deal cards by attaching tags, contacts, custom fields & groups and change currencies as needed. Customizable Pipelines

### Unlimited Pipelines

### Pick from existing and/or customize templates specific to your business. Utilize templates for industries such as Insurance, Real Estate, Automobile, Business Consulting, Financial Services, Legal Services, Non-Profit Fundraising, and Mortgage Brokers. Vertical Industry Pipeline Templates

### Choose any existing or custom fields to be displayed on your deal cards. No more wasted time on looking for important info. Customizable Deal Cards

### Individual & Team Reports

Prospect Marketing & Outreach
